mapper.select: SELECT a.fid AS ursId, a.fnumber AS ursNumber, a.cfsaleprojectid AS saleProjectId, b.fseq AS cfSeq, b.CFTYPE AS cfType, b.CFOURSTANDARD AS ourStandard, b.CFCUSTCONTENT AS customStandard, b.CFSATISFY AS isSatisfy, b.CFCONCLUSION AS conclusion, b.CFREMARK AS remark FROM CT_URS_ProjectURSDemand a LEFT JOIN CT_URS_ProjectURSDNS b ON a.fid = b.fparentid WHERE a.cfstatus = 4 AND b.fid IS NOT NULL ORDER BY a.fbizdate DESC
